alert.note: Alert for Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued July 17 at 8:22PM MDT until July 18 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 508 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 1 AM MDT /2 AM CDT/ TUESDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN SOUTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA MELLETTE TODD TRIPP IN SOUTHWEST SOUTH DAKOTA BENNETT CUSTER FALL RIVER JACKSON OGLALA LAKOTA IN WEST CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA HAAKON LAWRENCE MEADE PENNINGTON IN WYOMING THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN NORTHEAST WYOMING WESTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALLEN, BILLSBURG, BUCKHORN, CLARETON, CLEARFIELD, CUSTER, DEADWOOD, DOWNTOWN NEWCASTLE, EDGEMONT, FAITH, FOUR CORNERS, HERMOSA, HILL CITY, HOT SPRINGS, IDEAL, KADOKA, KIRLEY, KYLE, LACREEK WILDLIFE REFUGE, LEAD, MARTIN, MILESVILLE, MISSION, MORRISEY, OGLALA, PHILIP, PINE RIDGE, RAPID CITY, ROCHELLE, ROSEBUD, SAINT FRANCIS, SPEARFISH, STURGIS, TUTHILL, UNION CENTER, UPTON, WALL, WHITE RIVER, WINNER, AND WOOD. THIS INCLUDES THE TRIBAL LANDS OF THE PINE RIDGE RESERVATION AND THE ROSEBUD RESERVATION.
